item.title: pymechtest
item.description: pymechtest is a small, hopefully helpful python package to help engineers collate, process, analyse, and report on mechanical test data.

item.title: Fatigue Damage Prediction
item.description: Using machine learning to predict fatigue crack growth under complex thermomechanical loads.
